metadata.synopsis: Idle AD for the head clerk doing paperwork

0.speaker: Head Clerk Meadhoney
0.text: Just balance the book and move on like always, Meadhoney. Nothing more valuable than a simple life...
0.context: NodeContext: Muttering to himself about the boss he dislikes. This is reference to his boss' membership of the criminal Guild. Meadhoney is aware, but doesn't want to get involved.

1.speaker: Head Clerk Meadhoney
1.text: More unmarked withdrawals. You could at least try to hide the Guild accounts, Glitterbeard...
1.context: NodeContext: Muttering to himself about the boss he dislikes. This is reference to his boss' membership of the criminal Guild. Meadhoney is aware, but doesn't want to get involved.

2.speaker: Head Clerk Meadhoney
2.text: Take your time down there, Head Banker. We're not busy up here at all.
2.context: NodeContext: Muttering to himself about the boss he dislikes
